string-array.name: rules
string-array.item: You cannot quit the test window during the test. Doing so will result in immediate disqualification without warning. (Even opening the navigation drawer will disqualify you.)
Enable airplane mode before proceeding. This will prevent calls from causing accidentally disqualification/
Re-enable WiFi after enabling airplane mode, as enabling airplane mode will disable Wifi.
You can swipe through the questions. A timer in the upper corner will inform you about the time left. When the time is up, the test will get automatically submitted.
To submit the test, select the "Submit" option in the top corner and select "Yes" in the confirmation dialog to submit.
Once you start a test, you cannot retake it under any circumstances.
